data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, source subject ID, and affection status of participants with primary and metastatic colorectal cancer lesions and involved in the "Comparative Sequence Analysis Between Primary and Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Lesions" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject
